title: APPLY & GET 2 MO. FREE ! ++ Beautifully Upgraded - Luxe Finishes
posting_body: ['Welcome Home to Santa Rosa Oaks!', 'Move into one of our brand new luxury two-bedroom floorplans.', 'Santa Rosa Oaks', 'show contact info', '1521 Range Ave', 'Santa Rosa CA 95401', 'Bed: 2', 'Bath: 1', 'Rent: 2500', 'Come home to a newly renovated community in the heart of Santa Rosa.', 'At Santa Rosa Oaks you won’t just be coming home, you’ll be coming home to a place you love.', 'We can’t wait to meet you—contact us today!', 'Shop at Whole Foods, Macy’s, Target and many other specialty stores.', 'Luxury living in the heart of Sonoma County - beautifully upgraded with luxe finishes.', 'Located minutes off Highway 101, within walking distance of the SMART Train, and only a short drive to Santa Rosa Junior College and Annadel State Park, Santa Rosa Oaks makes life more convenient and more fun!', 'Our Amenities', 'Professional On-Site Management', 'Quartz Countertops', 'Easy Access to Hwy 101 & 12', 'Washer & Dryer in unit', 'Central Heating & Air', 'Microwave', 'Walk to SMART train & Public Transportation', 'Plank flooring', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Disposal', 'Gas Range', 'Dishwasher', 'Recessed Lighting', 'Beautifully Landscaped', 'Convenient to Shopping', 'In addition to our well appointed apartments, our best amenity is our location!', 'We’re just a half-mile down the street from Coddingtown Mall where enjoyment awaits.', 'Life in your Santa Rosa Oaks home also includes high-speed internet that you can easily control from your smart phone.', 'Or step across the street to enjoy beautiful Finali Park which features two playgrounds, a charming community garden and a spacious dog park.', 'Our brand new two-bedroom floorplans feature gourmet kitchens with stainless steel appliances and quartz countertops, in-unit washer and dryer, plank flooring, modern finishes and central heating and air.', 'Take a class at Orangetheory Fitness or Crunch Gym.', 'Grab a bite at  one of the many restaurants.', 'There’s even a spa, a nail salon and a beauty salon if you need a little pampering.', 'Our community offers brand new, two bedroom floor plans with clean, modern finishes that perfectly compliment our bright, open spaces.']
